column5: Has anyone fished Perrault Lake in Perrault Falls lately? It's been a few years since I have been up there fishing and I was just wondering how the fishing is going....Thanks,Bryan
Check out our pictures on facebook at "Friends of Rocky Shore Lodge ". Fishing has been great. Water levels are low due to lack of rain and snow. Time to come and fish Perrault Lake
Thanks for the info.. I will be back up next June to stay with you!
